writer.name: 比尔·古登泰格 Bill Guttentag

director.name: 比尔·古登泰格 Bill Guttentag

introduction: SPIRAL is a dramatic and powerful view of the toll that mental illness takes on one woman's life and family. The story is told through intimate home video footage. Michelle grows up in a tough, drug- fueled home in small-town Indiana, while Randy is from a loving military family from Alaska. They meet and quickly fall in love, but on the first day they're together, Michelle tells Randy: "I come from a crazy family."
